word: G4342 - προσκαρτερέω - proskarteréō - pros-kar-ter-eh'-o - Attend continually

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - நெருங்கிவா, உறுதியாய்த் தரி, ஒருமனப்படு, பற்றிக்கொள், இடைவிடாமல் பண்ணு

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From G4314 and G2594; to be earnest towards, that is, (to a thing) to persevere, be constantly diligent, or (in a place) to attend assiduously all the exercises, or (to a person) to adhere closely to (as a servitor): - attend (give self) continually (upon), continue (in, instant in, with), wait on (continually).
Cognate: G2594, G4342, G4343
